lead_paragraph: Doug Watson rose from mucking stalls in Illinois to become one of the top trainers in Dubai, where on Saturday he will saddle Candy Boy in the $10 million World Cup.

headline.main: In Dubai, an American’s Racing Dreams Come True
headline.print_headline: In Dubai, an American's Racing Dreams Come True

snippet: Doug Watson rose from mucking stalls in Illinois to become one of the top trainers in Dubai, where on Saturday he will saddle Candy Boy in the $10 million World Cup.
